experience.description: Worked on a wide range of in house and offshore projects including War Dragons, Sun and Sand Sports, Sandbox, Explottens, Run Sheeda Run developed by PocketGems, Sun & Sand Sports, Pixowl and weRplay respectively
Worked on a Dubai based project called CarPal, Developed Web Automation Framework for the web App using Java and Selenium, Improved the Regression time by automating the regression cases

Improved Application Rating to 4.6 for closing of year 2019, Worked with Easypaisa (Top Rated Finance category app in Pakistan), Reduced the Crashes of Easypaisa application and improved crash-free rate from ~80% to 99.7%, Increased online positive reviews by 30%
Working in a cross-functional team to deliver high quality product features to our clients, Enterprise clients include Cisco Meraki, Cohesity, VISA Earthport and BurstSMS
